en.title: FusionExcel Supports PCSB AKCC Charity Golf Event For Orphanage!
en.content:
REPORT BY FE LEADER DR. MARIA ABDULLAH.

The “PCSB AKCC Charity Golf Untuk Rumah Anak-Anak Yatim Pinggir (Orphanage), Taman Tun Dr. Ismail, KL” was “Teed-off” by YM Tengku Ahmad Nazeri B. Tengku Musa of Lembaga Kemajuan Terengganu (KETENGAH) on 11th July 2009 @ 2pm. This Charity Golf tournament is to help raise funds for Rumah Anak-Anak Yatim Pingger, TTDI as this orphanage home is in need of funds for the children's school books, school bus fees as well as for maintenance of the building. 

Among the VIP guests who played that day was YM Tengku Ahmad Nazeri, YBhg. Dato’ Sulaiman Ahmad (Vice President, Eastern Region, Celcom Malaysia) and some corporate figures. In total there were about 114 participants. 

The Golf activity started off with a Group Photo session and continued with the Quantum Pendant Demos by FE's Spokesman, International Golf Long Drive Specialist Mr. Jean Daniels. Jean explained why he started using FE's Quantum Science products and gave tips to the audience on how to play easier golf as well as how to have good and easy Tee-Offs. He also did some trick shots to the amazement of the crowd. 

Everyone proceeded to the dinner hall after the golf tournament. During the dinner the Organizing Chairman from Perfect Check-Mate Sdn. Bhd. Dr. Maria Abdullah thanked FusionExcel International for their kind contribution to make this activity a success. FE Leader Mr. Adam Fung presented the mock cheque of RM 23,000 (FE products) and RM 5,000.00 cash donation (from FE Philippines Country Licensee Jeremy Looi) to the Organizing Chairman as well as FusionExcel products to Dato’ Sulaiman. Dr. Maria presented FusionExcel products to YM Tengku Nazri. Mr. Adam Fung demonstrated how FE's Quantum Pendant is effective for golfers especially how they can get extra strength, better balance and flexibility. During the dinner, a few QPs and Quantum Flasks were auctioned off and we managed to collect RM 1,200.00 to be given to the Rumah Anak-Anak Yatim Pinggir, TTDI. 

Mr Liew gave his QP to Mr Moore from Australia to try on the tournament day. Mr Moore was really impressed and happy with the QP. In his testimonial he said his swing was better. Normally for a distance of 150 meter he need to use a pitching iron to make it but this time with the QP he used a sand wedge and still hit over the green! His driving was much better. He don’t feel tired at all. He added that he would get one of FE's QP and promotes it to the Australian Ambassador here in Malaysia! 

The 1st Prize was won by Mr. Lwee Kim Pon, The 2nd Prize won by Kol. Mohd. Zain and 3rd Prize won by YBhg Dato’ Sulaiman. 

I would like to thank FusionExcel International, Mr. Jeremy Looi and all the FusionExcel team who gave me this great opportunity to build and excel my career in FusionExcel! 

ON! ON!
